summary: VIVA IMPACT Complete Redesign - All features tested successfully. Mario removed and replaced by Holographic Arcade Core. Premium splash screen, CTA with platform thumbnail, fixed grid cards, mobile responsiveness all working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Complete redesign verified successfully. Key findings: (1) Mario completely removed - replaced by Holographic Arcade Core with diamond+stars+lightning icon, spinning rings, and emanating particles; (2) New splash screen with minimalist star (Mario reference), VIVA IMPACT logo, holographic ring spinning, progress bar, 'Inicializando sistema...' text; (3) CTA 'ACESSAR PLATAFORMA' now has visible platform thumbnail (FG JOGO image) with support text 'Ambiente seguro • Alta performance • Online em tempo real'; (4) Cards in fixed grid without overflow - AI PREDICTION + 5 providers (PG, PP, Spirit, Tada, Reeveme); (5) 200+ games card with animated progress bar and AI accuracy 90-99.5% MOCKED animation; (6) Footer 3 lines: responsibility badges, providers text, platform logos grid; (7) Mobile responsive: stacked layout, core 271x271px, providers in 2 columns; (8) Premium animations: entrance fade+slide on title, pop on CTA, background particles, breathing gradient, all glow effects working.
mocked_api_note: AI Accuracy percentage (96.5%) is MOCKED - animated locally via JavaScript setInterval varying between 90-99.5%
